Attributes.description: Development of a wood products manufacturing start-up company. Development of comprehensive business plan, marketing strategy, product design, equipment selection and justification, manufacturing plant layout, and economic analyses.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: All of WOOD 365, WOOD 440. (and fourth-year standing in Wood Products Processing.)
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 2, Days: Mon Wed, Start Time: 15:00, End Time: 17:00, Building: Forest, Room: Sciences
